channel.title: Mildew Resistance on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Mildew Resistance on funPlantGenes

item.title: BrMAPK15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bra003834 Gene Symbol: BrMAPK15 Gene Name: Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase 15 Genome: Brassica database (http://brassicadb.

item.title: BrWAK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bra016428 Gene Symbol: BrWAK1 Gene Name: Genome: B.

item.title: CaMLO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana08g000221 Gene Symbol: CaMLO1 Gene Name: mildew resistance locus O 1 Genome: Genome assembly Pepper Zunla 1 Ref_v1.

item.title: CsAAP2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4M573860 Gene Symbol: CsAAP2A Gene Name: Amino Acid Permease 2A Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: DM resistance in cucumber due to CsAAP2A mutations is caused by perturbing pathogen-induced amino acid loading of infected leaves.

item.title: CsCRK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_2G024820 Gene Symbol: CsCRK2 Gene Name: cysteine-rich receptor-like kinase 2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsMLO8 and CsCRK2 competitively interact with the C-terminus of CsRbohD to affect CsCRK2-CsRbohD module-mediated ROS production during PM defense.

item.title: CsLRR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsGy5G016190 Gene Symbol: CsLRR1 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Gy14) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: A single-nucleotide substitution in the Leucine-Rich-Repeat-only gene CsLRR1 confers powdery mildew resistance in cucumber.

item.title: CsMLO11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_6G021740 Gene Symbol: CsMLO11 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Knockout mutants of CsMLO8 and CsMLO11 generated by CRISPR/Cas9 both showed improved PM resistance in the stem, hypocotyl, and leaves, and the double mutant mlo8mlo11 displayed even stronger resistance.

item.title: CsMLO8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_5G036400 Gene Symbol: CsMLO8 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The reverse mutation of CsMLO8 results in susceptibility to powdery mildew via inhibiting cell wall apposition formation and cell death in cucumber.

item.title: CsPM5.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa5M471600 Gene Symbol: CsPM5.2 Gene Name: Powdery mildew 5.

item.title: CsRbohD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_3G043480 Gene Symbol: CsRbohD Gene Name: respiratory burst oxidase homolog D Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsMLO8 and CsCRK2 competitively interact with the C-terminus of CsRbohD to affect CsCRK2-CsRbohD module-mediated ROS production during PM defense.

item.title: HSP90.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS7B02G149200 Gene Symbol: HSP90.2 Gene Name: Heat Shock Protein 90.

item.title: HvCEBiP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TA30910_4513 Gene Symbol: HvCEBiP Gene Name: CEBiP chitin receptor Genome: barley EST database Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Our findings suggest that HvWRKY2 represses barley basal immunity by directly targeting pathogen-associated molecular pattern (PAMP) recognition receptor genes, suggesting that HvCEBiP and likely chitin signaling function in barley PAMP-triggered immune responses to Bgh infection.

item.title: HvCslD2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvCslD2 Gene Name: cellulose synthase-like D2 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The barley (Hordeum vulgare) cellulose synthase-like D2 gene (HvCslD2) mediates penetration resistance to host-adapted and nonhost isolates of the powdery mildew fungus.

item.title: HvMPK4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvMPK4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvMPK4 phosphorylates HvWRKY1 to enhance its suppression of barley immunity to powdery mildew fungus.

item.title: HvMyo11A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU.MOREX.r3.1HG0046420 Gene Symbol: HvMyo11A1|Ror1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Barley HvMyo11A1|Ror1 encodes a class XI myosin required for mlo-based broad-spectrum resistance to the fungal powdery mildew pathogen.

item.title: HvWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvWRKY1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvWRKY1 is phosphorylated in barley at the early stages of Bgh infection, which enhances its suppression on barley immunity likely due to enhanced DNA-binding and transcriptional repression activity.

item.title: LecRK-V
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LecRK-V Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: Lr34;Yr18
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS7D02G080300 Gene Symbol: Lr34 Yr18 Sr57 Pm38 Ltn1 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: Lr67
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4D02G243100 Gene Symbol: Lr67 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: MdMLO19
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000168714 Gene Symbol: MdMLO19 Gene Name: Mildew Locus O 19 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: Mds-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCSU02G074100LC Gene Symbol: Mds-1 Gene Name: Mayetiola destructor susceptibility-1 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: MhYTP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MhYTP2 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: Ml92145E8-9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Ml92145E8-9 Gene Name: Ml92145E8-9 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Molecular mapping of a novel wheat powdery mildew resistance gene Ml92145E8-9 and its application in wheat breeding by marker-assisted selection.

item.title: MlWE18
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MlWE18 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: MusaDMR6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma04_p20880.1 Gene Symbol: MusaDMR6 Gene Name: downy mildew resistance 6 Genome: Species: Musa balbisiana Functional Descriptions: The downy mildew resistance 6 (DMR6) is a susceptibility gene encoding 2-oxoglutarate Fe(II)-dependent oxygenase (2OGO), which is up-regulated during pathogen infection.

item.title: Pm1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Pm1a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Pm1a, the first powdery mildew resistance gene described in wheat, is part of a complex resistance (R) gene cluster located in a distal region of chromosome 7AL that has suppressed genetic recombination.

item.title: Pm2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5D02G044600 Gene Symbol: Pm2 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: Pm21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Pm21 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: Pm24;Pm24b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS1D02G058900 Gene Symbol: Pm24 Pm24b WTK3 MlHLT Gene Name: TANDEM KINASE 3 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: Pm3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS1A02G008100 Gene Symbol: Pm3 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: Pm36
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Pm36 Gene Name: powdery mildew resistance 36 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The isolation of broad-spectrum powdery mildew resistance gene Pm36, originated from wild emmer wheat, that encodes a tandem kinase with a transmembrane domain (WTK7-TM) through the combination of map-based cloning, PacBio SMRT long-read genome sequencing, mutagenesis, and transformation.

item.title: Pm3b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Pm3b Gene Name: Powdery mildew resistance protein PM3b Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Transgenic Pm3b wheat lines show resistance to powdery mildew in the field.

item.title: Pm4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Pm4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat Pm4 resistance to powdery mildew is controlled by alternative splice variants encoding chimeric proteins.

item.title: Pm57
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Pm57 Gene Name: Powdery mildew 57 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Pm57 from Aegilops searsii encodes a tandem kinase protein and confers wheat powdery mildew resistance.

item.title: Pm5e
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS7B02G441700 Gene Symbol: Pm5e Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: PMR4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc07g053980 Gene Symbol: PMR4 Gene Name: PowderyMildewResistance 4 Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: PpGS1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpGS1.1 Gene Name: Glutamine synthetase Genome: Species: Poa pratensis Functional Descriptions: Glutamine synthetase gene PpGS1.

item.title: PsMLO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsMLO1 Gene Name: mildew resistance locus O gene 1 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: The observed resistance in Yunwan 8 plants resulted from a point mutation (C → G) at position 680 of PsMLO1 that introduced a stop codon, leading to premature termination of protein synthesis.

item.title: RGA4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Wheat_Chr_Trans_newGene_16173 Gene Symbol: RGA4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Candidate powdery mildew resistance gene (RGA4) in wheat landrace cultivar Hongyoumai discovered using SLAF and BSR-seq.

item.title: TaCDPK27
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5B02G109300 Gene Symbol: TaCDPK27 Gene Name: calcium-dependent protein kinases 27 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The Calcium-Dependent Protein Kinase TaCDPK27 Positively Regulates Salt Tolerance in Wheat.

item.title: TaCPK2-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCPK2-A Gene Name: calcium-dependent protein kinase 2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaCPK2-A, a calcium-dependent protein kinase gene that is required for wheat powdery mildew resistance enhances bacterial blight resistance in transgenic rice.

item.title: TaEDR1-1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaEDR1-1A Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaEIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaEIL1 Gene Name: ETHYLENE INSENSITIVE3-LIKE1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: bread wheat ETHYLENE INSENSITIVE3-LIKE1 (TaEIL1), an ortholog of Arabidopsis (Arabidopsis thaliana) ETHYLENE INSENSITIVE3, negatively regulates bread wheat resistance against powdery mildew.

item.title: TaHAG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS1D02G134200 Gene Symbol: TaHAG1 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaMED25-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaMED25-A Gene Name: Mediator subunit 25 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The Wheat Mediator Subunit TaMED25 Interacts with the Transcription Factor TaEIL1 to Negatively Regulate Disease Resistance against Powdery Mildew.

item.title: TaMED25-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaMED25-B Gene Name: Mediator subunit 25 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The Wheat Mediator Subunit TaMED25 Interacts with the Transcription Factor TaEIL1 to Negatively Regulate Disease Resistance against Powdery Mildew.

item.title: TaMED25-D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaMED25-D Gene Name: Mediator subunit 25 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The Wheat Mediator Subunit TaMED25 Interacts with the Transcription Factor TaEIL1 to Negatively Regulate Disease Resistance against Powdery Mildew.

item.title: TaMlo-A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5A02G494800 Gene Symbol: TaMlo-A1 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaMlo-B1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4B02G322700 Gene Symbol: TaMlo-B1 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaMlo-D1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4D02G319100 Gene Symbol: TaMlo-D1 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaPAD4-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4B02G100100 Gene Symbol: TaPAD4-B Gene Name: Phytoalexin Deficient 4 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaPLATZ5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2D02G447400 Gene Symbol: TaPLATZ5 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaRLK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaRLK1 Gene Name: LRR receptor-like protein kinase 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Two members of TaRLK family (TaRLK1 and TaRLK2) confer powdery mildew resistance in common wheat.

item.title: TaRLK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaRLK1 Gene Name: Receptor-like kinase 1 Genome: IWGSC reference sequence v1.

item.title: TaRLK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaRLK2 Gene Name: LRR receptor-like protein kinase 2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Two members of TaRLK family (TaRLK1 and TaRLK2) confer powdery mildew resistance in common wheat.

item.title: TaRLK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaRLK2 Gene Name: Receptor-like kinase 2 Genome: IWGSC reference sequence v1.

item.title: TaTMT3B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4B02G322000 Gene Symbol: TaTMT3B Gene Name: Tonoplast monosaccharide transporter 3 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TmMla1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TmMla1 Gene Name: Mla homologue 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The wheat Mla homologue TmMla1 exhibits an evolutionarily conserved function against powdery mildew in both wheat and barley.

item.title: VpRFP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VpRFP1 Gene Name: C4C4-type RING finger protein Genome: Species: Vitis pseudoreticulata Functional Descriptions: VpRFP1, a novel C4C4-type RING finger protein gene from Chinese wild Vitis pseudoreticulata, functions as a transcriptional activator in defence response of grapevine.

item.title: VqMAPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_06s0004g03540 Gene Symbol: VqMAPK3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Vitis quinquangularis Functional Descriptions: VqMAPK3/VqMAPK6, VqWRKY33, and VqNSTS3 constitute a regulatory node in enhancing resistance to powdery mildew in grapevine.

item.title: VqMAPK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_05s0094g00900 Gene Symbol: VqMAPK6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Vitis quinquangularis Functional Descriptions: VqMAPK3/VqMAPK6, VqWRKY33, and VqNSTS3 constitute a regulatory node in enhancing resistance to powdery mildew in grapevine.

item.title: VqWRKY31
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_10s0116g01200 Gene Symbol: VqWRKY31 Gene Name: Genome: V.

item.title: VviEDR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VviEDR1 Gene Name: ENHANCED DISEASE RESISTANCE1 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Chimeric mutations in grapevine ENHANCED DISEASE RESISTANCE1 improve resistance to powdery mildew without growth penalty.

item.title: VvMLO3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvMLO3 Gene Name: mildew resistance Locus O 3 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: CRISPR/Cas9-mediated mutagenesis of VvMLO3 results in enhanced resistance to powdery mildew in grapevine.

item.title: VvNAC72
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvNAC72 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: These results demonstrate that grapevine VvNAC72 negatively modulates detoxification of MG through repression of VvGLYI-4, and finally enhances resistance to downy mildew, at least in part, via the modulation of MG-associated ROS homeostasis through a salicylic acid-mediated defense pathway.

item.title: VvNPR1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GSVIVT00016536001 Gene Symbol: VvNPR1.1 Gene Name: Non-Expressor of PR genes 1 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Vitis vinifera VvNPR1.

item.title: VvPR4b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvPR4b Gene Name: Genome: “Pinot Noir” reference genome Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Our results confirm that VvPR4b plays an active role in the defense of grapevine against downy mildew.

item.title: VvPUB26
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_03s0063g00180 Gene Symbol: VvPUB26 Gene Name: U-box domain-containing protein 26 Genome: grape genome database Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Ubiquitin ligase VvPUB26 in grapevine promotes proanthocyanidin synthesis and resistance to powdery mildew.
